mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill (BId, BType, BName, BMonth,BPrice, BUpdateTime,BMark) VALUES(#{bId}, #{bType}, #{bName}, #{bMonth},#{bPrice}, #{bUpdateTime}, #{bMark})
mapper.update: UPDATE bill SET BType = #{bType}, BName = #{bName}, BMonth = #{bMonth}, BPrice = #{bPrice}, BUpdateTime = #{bUpdateTime}, BMark = #{bMark} WHERE BId = #{bId}
mapper.select: SELECT BId, BType, BName, BMonth, BPrice, BUpdateTime, BMark FROM bill
